name: Metal Nomad (Godot Wild Jam)
description:
DISCLAIMER: There is a some profanity in this game. 

You are THE Metal Nomad. After stumbling on a flyer for the illustrious "Tribes Gathering" you will have to travel for 3 suns and 3 moons, killing hordes of demons and causing general mischief along the way.

Controls
  • Use the arrows, AWSD or AZSD to move around.
  • Click from the moment the guitar pick is over the green section of the music bar to fire deadly projectiles.

This game was created in one weekend for the Godot Wild Jam. I know it is still rough around the edges and there are some bugs. But I wanted to be able to work on my main project during the week, it is what it is 😅

Source code available on Github.
